tool_description: Analyzes user and system behavior patterns to detect insider threats, compromised accounts, and unusual activity patterns.

activity_logs.description: User and system activity logs for behavioral analysis.

user_profiles.description: Existing user behavior profiles for comparison.

analysis_type.description: Type of behavioral analysis: user_centric, time_based, or resource_access.

learning_period.description: Learning period in days for establishing normal behavior (1-90).

error_messages: Insufficient activity data: Need at least 10 activity log entries for behavioral analysis.
Invalid analysis type: Use user_centric, time_based, or resource_access.
Invalid learning period: Learning period must be between 1 and 90 days.
Profile format error: User profiles must be in valid JSON format with required behavioral metrics.
usage: Provide activity logs and optionally existing user profiles. Specify analysis type and learning period. Returns behavioral anomalies and updated profiles.

behavioral_anomalies.description: Detected behavioral anomalies with user and activity details

updated_profiles.description: Updated user behavior profiles in JSON format

risk_indicators.description: Risk indicators for users showing anomalous behavior
